Ethnic Studies.1: Demonstrate an understanding of U.S. and/or transnational ethnic history.
Ethnic Studies.2: Demonstrate an understanding of U.S. and/or transnational culture and civilization
Ethnic Studies.3: Demonstrate an understanding of U.S. and/or transnational concerns with race, ethnicity, diversity.
Ethnic Studies.4: Demonstrate an understanding of U.S. and/or transnational concerns with immigration.
Ethnic Studies.5: Use and analyze library and other research resources.
Ethnic Studies.6: Think critically about disciplinary and interdisciplinary issues.
